responses.0: Hi Michele - We could make an exception with this price. The cleaning fee is also $75 per stay. Does this work for you? *************** Hi Sarah, my name is Michele and I am interested in staying at your place for 3 days, from 2016-04-12 to 2016-04-15. The calendar is open on these days and I am wondering if it is still available? A little bit more about myself: I am a graduate student from Milan, Italy and study Communication Design. I am fond of exploring cultures and visual arts around the world.I will visit New York a few times this year to work on a project with a local school. I will be there with 2 collegues of mine, who will stay with me.  Because my schedule match perfectly with the opening in your calendar, I am wondering if you would be willing to lower the rate to $95/night? I would be willing to make the booking immediately if the price is ok with you. ***************
responses.1:
Hi Michele,

I pre-approved your request without reading that you were asking for $80/night.  Unfortunately, I am not able to reduce the rate by 50%.  

Please feel free to ask any questions and I will do my best to answer them.

Angele *************** Hi Angele, my name is Michele and I am interested in staying at your place for 3 days, from 2016-06-20 to 2016-06-23. responses.4:
Hi Michele, 

Thanks for inquiring. We have been to several cities in Italy and have always wanted to visit Milan. Your project sounds very interesting! 

These dates are still open and we would be happy to host you and your colleague. However, we would have to maintain the nightly rate as we typically get a high number of requests for around that time of the year. I have pre-approved you if you do decide to book with us. Thanks!

responses.7:
Hello Michele,
Thanks for your nice note. However, May is a busy time of year for people visiting NYC, so I'm sorry that I cannot go as low as $70 a night. Those three nights will end up booking. I will allow you and your friend to stay for $90 a night plus the regular cleaning fee...or you can perhaps stay in a hotel that will be cheaper.

Let me know if you have any questions--I am happy to help with information.

Best,

responses.9:
Ciao Michele, thanks for your message... yes, the calendar is open and indeed it matches perfectly with the opening I have that week... it's a two bedroom apartment, so it would be perfect for you and your colleague... the best price I can give you though is 200 per night... 

Let me know if that works for you and if you have any further questions and we'll take it from there. 

Cheers!!

Italo

responses.10:
Hi Michele, 

Thanks for writing. I would be more than happy to host you but the best offer I can make is $125 a night since it's peak season and I usually don't have trouble filling the space at my asking price. Most of my friends in university were communications or design students and I dated a girl from Milan for some time, so you would be in good hands. Let me know if this will work and all the best either way.

responses.13:
Hi Michele,

Thank you for reaching out to us.  I believe that I have someone who will be jumping into this time slot.  It seems to be a snug fit.

I would recommend that you check out other offerings in our lovely neighborhood, or Brooklyn in general, which is quite vibrant (and safe) these days.

Best regards,
